Title: Compiler Check
TaskDescription: This assignment is designed to make sure that the Java compiler (JDK) is correctly installed on your machine

NeedHelp.Title: Open Terminal
NeedHelp.TaskDescription: Path is 'Start Menu | All Programs | Accessories | Command Prompt'

NeedHelp.Title: Typing Commands
NeedHelp.TaskDescription:
Type 'javac -version'. If it is correctly installed you should see version number like 'javac 1.7.0_04'. The exact version number doesn't matter, as long as it starts with 1.6 or higher. 
If the JDK isn't installed, then you will see an error like 
'javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command, 
operable program or batch file.
